pages.title: Basic Circuit
pages.text: A basic electric circuit board, built for general systems with no special requirements, whose architecture is based on graphene.

pages.title: Advanced Circuit
pages.text: A more advanced electric circuit board, built for systems with low latency in mind, whose architecture is based on graphene.

pages.title: Elite Circuit
pages.text: An elite electric circuit board, built for systems with high throughput and low latency in mind, whose architecture makes use of coveted, laboratory-made materials.
